info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 04 at 7:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...Intense snow showers will impact portions of north central Ravalli County through 800 AM MST... At 658 AM MST, Doppler radar is tracking several lines of intense snow showers in the Bitterroot Valley this morning. Quickly changing road conditions are expected under these showers and may put down a quick 1 inch of snow as they move overhead. Reduced visibility and slick conditions can be expected for the morning commute. Movement is east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Visibility one-half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility could result hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Stevensville, Victor, Florence, Woodside, Pinesdale, Grantsdale, Bell Crossing, Charlos Heights, Corvallis and Como. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
